timeline.bodyText: Do we really need this warning? It looks a bit too intrusive? I might misunderstand it but won't you have the warning as soon as you enable the extension?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Intrusive? How so? The warning will only be displayed during build time if no webjar dependencies were are added to the build, which makes this extension useless.
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Sure but that's not how other extensions behave. You don't have a warn if you don't have any Hibernate ORM entities for instance.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: I see, perhaps it should display the encountered webjars then? Or do you want to completely remove it?
replies.author: gastaldi
